title: How to Bind Keys for Counter Strike

steps.title: Start the game.
steps.content: Start the game. Go to Options -> Keyboard Tab

steps.title: Locate the desired action whose bind you want to change and then change it.
steps.content: Locate the desired action whose bind you want to change and then change it.

steps.title: Start the console (The ~ button beside the '1' key)
steps.content: Start the console (The ~ button beside the '1' key)

steps.title: Write [bind "<key name>" "<action name>"] without the brackets but the quotes will be there.
steps.content: Write [bind "<key name>" "<action name>"] without the brackets but the quotes will be there. Then hit enter and you're done.
